content:
This is a second maintenance window for the same task as the one in June 7th. This maintenance window might be cancelled after the maintenance of June 7th.

üìÖ Timeline:
- Full maintenance window begins: June 8, 2025 04:00 UTC
- Full maintenance window expected duration: 4 hours

‚ö†Ô∏è Service Restrictions (Starting 04:00 UTC):
- Consider that for the full 4h window the system will be read-only
- There is going to be a limited-time window in which the system might be completely down.

We will provide more status updates during the maintenance window. 

Thank you for your understanding.
